mdRecord.dcterms:description: View of gable roofs from street

In the 1919 Matheuson (sic) house two broad gabled roofs were gathered at one end of the house, under a roof with an off-center ridge, with remarkable grace. The first-floor walls were of stucco, and the upper ones of rough redwood boards were stained a moss green. -- http://www.verlang.com/sfbay0004ref_bm_07.html#La_Loma [work]
